name: Gemology (itch)
description:
Gemology is a space-themed gem-matching game in the style of Bejeweled. Swap adjacent gems to create matches, earning those gems in the process.

The in-game 'Gem Guide' allows you to view how many cumulative gems you have collected during your play, and also gives you some factual insight about the seven different gems that feature in the game.

Gemology has four different game modes for you to try:

  • Classic - keep playing, earning points for each match you make, until you run out of possible matches;
  • Match Maker - make as many matches as you can within the 5 minutes available;
  • Time Attack - match gems as quickly as you can in order to fill the match bar, which slowly depletes over time;
  • Gemologist - collect as many gems as you can by making matches within the 5 minutes available.
